other_tests.findings: Mildly dilated common bile duct associated with cholecystectomy. No evidence of focal lesions in liver, spleen, or adrenal glands. Kidneys normal with subcentimeter hypoattenuating lesions likely representing cysts. Interval improvement of pericolonic fat stranding with persistent mild soft tissue thickening and extraluminal gas adjacent to sigmoid colon. No new fluid collection, no free air. Diverticulosis of sigmoid colon demonstrated.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Interval improvement of pericolonic fat stranding, some adjacent mild residual soft tissue thickening improved.
